free_text.Learning outcomes: [li] Principles of chemical changes occuring during food processing[br/][br/][li] Parameters affecting quality attributes of processed food[br/]
free_text.Content: [li] Major chemical reactions taking place in food processing (Maillard reaction, lipid oxidation, interactions with polyphenols)[br/][br/][li] Physico-chemical changes influencing product quality (aroma, taste, colour, texture, nutritional value)[br/][li] The role of water in food processing & preservation (water activity, shelf-life)[br/][li] Selected processes used in food preparation & manufacturing, such as[br/]- Thermal processes & inactivation[br/]- Drying & water reduction[br/]- Extrusion[br/]- Separation processes[br/]- Dispersed systems[br/]
